Order now 30 days to think about it 10 year warranty Free fabric samples Designer sofa up to 7 days Design for life! We believe that design is made for life. Personal space should exist in harmony with a person, and interior items should make life simpler and more comfortable. At LightRoom we develop designer furniture that surprises, tells stories and adds a little something special to every day. OUR STYLE LightRoom is Scandinavian-style designer furniture, designed and manufactured for active people who seek to combine the traditions of Scandinavian design with their own individual style, combining functionality, reliability and comfort. Our products combine real life, because Scandinavian design is a way of life, not just a style. GET TO KNOW US We are a family company that combines knowledge and experience in furniture production, industrial design and a way of life. The idea of creating TM LightRoom arose as a result of this harmony. We produce furniture for Scandinavia. Our company fell in love with the style of this region and realized that its atmosphere reflected our vision of the surrounding space. So we decided to offer you furniture that is qualitatively new in design, which evokes vivid emotions, creating indescribable sensations, making the choice easy and convenient. Armchairs for the hallway Smiley chair Gray velor $ 150 Order now Sunland chair Dark gray velor $ 140 Order now Ingrid armchair Aquamarine matting $ 170 Order now His chair Solar velor $ 140 Order now Armchair in the living room Amelie armchair Almond microbread $ 150 Order now Fullhouse armchair Light mint micro matting $ 190 Order now Hygge chair Coffee gray velor $ 170 Order now Lounge chair Light turquoise velor $ 140 Order now LightRoom armchairs - the best furniture for the living room The ideal chair for the living room is one that matches not only the overall interior of the room, but also your lifestyle. It can be an accent piece or an organic addition to the sofa area, massive or small in size. But in any case, it must be made of high-quality materials, comfortable and durable. These are exactly the kind of armchairs our furniture company offers its clients in the living room. By purchasing living room chairs in our online store, customers receive products that combine the best qualities. The design of such chairs is usually more sophisticated than the design of furniture for offices or kitchens. Such models may have an unusual shape and complex decorative details. A living room chair usually differs from other types in size. Lounge furniture, as a rule, has wider seats and massive backs. Often comes with extra pillows. All this allows you to make your rest more comfortable and provide proper support for your back. In addition, many models of living room chairs have comfortable soft armrests. The fabrics for upholstering armchairs in the living room are exquisite. But at the same time, the upholstery must be wear-resistant and durable - the service life of the furniture depends on this. Armchairs for the living room that you can buy from us include a wide range of products that differ in design and style. Our catalog contains excellent options for living rooms decorated in a classic or vintage style, as well as furniture that perfectly matches the loft, Provence or Scandi aesthetics. Why us Quality Our products undergo detailed quality control at every stage of production Comfort We design furniture for a comfortable and stylish life that can turn your vacation into real pleasure Research Every month we allocate at least 30% of the company's profits to research and innovation, as we believe this is the key to our future success LightRoom Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions

LightRoom +91-80-43638201 About Hallway Living room Why us Contact Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You. Interpretation and Definitions Interpretation The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural. Definitions For the purposes of this Privacy Policy: Account means a unique account created for You to access our Service or parts of our Service. Affiliate means an entity that controls, is controlled by or is under common control with a party, where "control" means ownership of 50% or more of the shares, equity interest or other securities entitled to vote for election of directors or other managing authority. Company (referred to as either "the Company", "We", "Us" or "Our" in this Agreement) refers to LightRoom. Device means any device that can access the Service such as a computer, a cellphone or a digital tablet. Service refers to the Website. Service Provider means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Company. It refers to third-party companies or individuals employed by the Company to facilitate the Service, to provide the Service on behalf of the Company, to perform services related to the Service or to assist the Company in analyzing how the Service is used. You means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable. Children's Privacy Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 13. If You are a parent or guardian and You are aware that Your child has provided Us with Personal Data, please contact Us. If We become aware that We have collected Personal Data from anyone under the age of 13 without verification of parental consent, We take steps to remove that information from Our servers. If We need to rely on consent as a legal basis for processing Your information and Your country requires consent from a parent, We may require Your parent's consent before We collect and use that information. Links to Other Websites Our Service may contain links to other websites that are not operated by Us. If You click on a third party link, You will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise You to review the Privacy Policy of every site You visit. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update Our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify You of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. We will let You know via email and/or a prominent notice on Our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update the "Last updated" date at the top of this Privacy Policy. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact us: By email: LightRoom@gmail.com LightRoom Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions
